text: Sir Maurice Flanagan (17 October 1928 - 7 May 2015) was a British businessman. He was the founding CEO of Emirates. He was also the Executive Vice-Chairman of The Emirates Group. Flanagan was born in Leigh, Lancashire. He was married to Audrey Bolton from 1955 until his death. They had three children. He lived in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Flanagan died on 7 May 2015 in London, aged 86. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:English businesspeople Category:People from Wigan
title: Maurice Flanagan
